title: A Scent of Blood
description: Willow Falls used to be a small quiet town, that is until Ava Bertrand turns 21 and reveals the mark. What follows is a whirlwind of danger. Now that she has been captured by Caleb's estranged malevolent brother Blaez, time is running out.To make matters worse Ava learns Blaez not only wants to use her to wipe out her lover's race but that he has a mysterious connection to a dangerous vampire, named Jasper. If Ava and Caleb donâ€™t find out how to stop them, Blaez will wreak havoc on Willow Falls and take revenge on his brother, becoming Alpha once and for all.
author: Jocelyn Thomas
